Class Score

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.models.Score
public final class Score extends Object
Tracks score, level, total cleared lines and combo. Level: - Increases every LINES_PER_LEVEL lines, up to MAX_LEVEL. Combo: - Each landing that clears at least one line increases combo by 1 (up to MAX_COMBO). - Score bonus for that clear is multiplied by the current combo. - A landing with no clear resets combo to 0.

    • add

      public void add(int points)
      Adds a raw score bonus (used for soft drop, hard drop, rotation, etc.). Does not affect combo or level.
      Parameters:
      points - the number of points to add

    • addRotationScore

      public void addRotationScore()
      Awards points for rotating a piece.

    • addMoveScore

      public void addMoveScore()
      Awards points for moving a piece horizontally.

    • addHardDropScore

      public void addHardDropScore(int cellsDropped)
      Awards points for hard dropping a piece.
      Parameters:
      cellsDropped - number of cells the piece dropped

    • addHoldScore

      public void addHoldScore()
      Awards points for holding a piece.

    • registerLinesCleared

      public void registerLinesCleared(int linesRemoved, int scoreBonus)
      Registers that some lines were cleared on a landing and applies: total line count, combo multiplier, and level progression.
      Parameters:
      linesRemoved - number of lines cleared by this landing
      scoreBonus - base score reward for this clear (before combo multiplier)

    • registerLandingWithoutClear

      public void registerLandingWithoutClear()
      Called when a brick lands but no lines are cleared. Resets the combo chain to zero.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets all score-related values to their initial state. Sets score to 0, level to 1, total lines to 0, and combo to 0.
